13887.en:
The copy of 'Choten Yugi: Book Four' in your
possession began to glow!
13887.ja:
<pc>の　持っている
『超天遊戯－死の書－』が　光り始めた！
13887.ko:
{pc}|hpp(이,가) 가지고 있는
『초천유희 죽음의 권』이 빛나기 시작했다!
13887.zh-Hans:
<pc>持有的
《超天游戏－死之书－》开始发光了！
13887.zh-Hant:
<pc>持有的
《超天遊戲－死之書－》開始發光了！

13888.en:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> and Yarn began reading them.
13888.ja:
白紙だったページに　文字が浮かびあがってくる。
<pc>とヤーンは　その文字を読んだ。
13888.ko:
백지였던 페이지에 글자가 나타났다.
{pc}|hpp(과,와) 얀은 그 글자를 읽었다.
13888.zh-Hans:
本是白纸的页面出现了文字。
<pc>和杨一同阅读了这些文字。
13888.zh-Hant:
原本空白的頁面出現了文字。
<pc>和楊一同閱讀了頁面上的文字。

13889.en:
This training will be the last... but it won't
be the end.
13889.ja:
修行も今回で　最後になるからの……。
これで終わりでは　ないぞ。
13889.ko:
수련도 이번이 마지막일 터…….
여기서 끝낼 수는 없지.
13889.zh-Hans:
这次就是最后一次修行了……
但可别以为这样就结束了哦。
13889.zh-Hant:
這次就是最後一次修行了……
但可別以為這樣就結束了喔。

13890.en:
Somewhere in the Gatara Fields is the Gulug
Underpass. Place a Beast's Left and Right Horn
on the floor of the back room.
13890.ja:
ガタラ原野のどこかにある　グルグ地下道。
その奥の部屋の床に　魔獣の左角と
魔獣の右角を　突きたてるのじゃ。
13890.ko:
가타라 벌판 어딘가에 있는 구르그 지하도.
그 안쪽 방 바닥에 마수의 왼쪽 뿔과
마수의 오른쪽 뿔을 꽂거라.
13890.zh-Hans:
加塔拉原野上有个古尔古地下道。
你得把魔兽的左角与魔兽的右角
插在最深处的房间地上。
13890.zh-Hant:
加塔拉原野上有個辜魯格地下道。
你得把魔獸的左角與魔獸的右角
插在最深處的房間地上。

13891.en:
There, you will put your life on the line.
Fulfill this training with determination.
Abandoning it now will be unacceptable.
13891.ja:
そこで　おぬしは　命をかけることになる。
不退転の決意で　この修行を果たせ。
途中で　投げだすことは許さぬ。
13891.ko:
그곳에서 너는 목숨을 걸게 될 것이다.
결코 물러서지 않을 결의로 이 수련에 임하거라.
도중에 내팽개치는 것은 용납할 수 없다.
13891.zh-Hans:
在那里，会有一场赌上性命的战斗。
抱着毫不动摇的决心去完成这个修行吧。
绝不允许半途而废。
13891.zh-Hant:
在那裡，會有一場賭上性命的戰鬥。
抱著毫不動搖的決心去完成這個修行吧。
絕不允許半途而廢。

13892.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>The time's finally come. Looks like the cave
in Gatara Fields is the stage for the final
training lesson.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13892.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「いよいよ　来たな～。
　ドワーフの国の　ガタラ原野にある洞くつが
　最後の修行の舞台に　なるみたいだぜ～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13892.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 드디어 올 것이 왔군~
　드워프 왕국의 가타라 벌판에 있는 동굴이
　마지막 수련의 무대인 모양이야~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13892.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>总算来了～
多瓦夫族之国加塔拉原野的某处洞窟
成为了最后的修行的舞台呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13892.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>總算來了～
看來最後修行的舞台是在
多瓦夫之國加塔拉原野上的某處洞窟呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13893.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Well then, let's go and knock that training
out! Of course, I'll be coming along, too.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13893.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「そんじゃ～　はりきって
　修行を　果たしにいくとしようか～。
　もちろん　オレも　つきあうからさ～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13893.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 그럼~ 기운 내서
　수련을 끝내러 가 보실까~
　물론 나도 같이 갈게~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13893.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>那就打起精神
去完成修行吧～
当然，我也会一同前往～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13893.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>那就打起精神
去完成修行吧～
當然，我也會一同前往～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13894.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>It said we'll be 'putting our lives on the
line.' You never know what might happen, so
make sure you're prepared.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13894.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「命をかけろって　言ってるくらいだからな～。
　何が起こるか　わからねえぜ？
　準備は　しっかりとしていけよ～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13894.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 목숨을 걸어야 한다고 하는 걸 보니~
　무슨 일이 일어날지 몰라.
　준비 단단히 해~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13894.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>都说了要拼上性命了～
不知道会发生什么呢。
要好好做准备哦～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13894.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>畢竟都說了要拚上性命～
不知道會發生什麼事呢。
要好好做準備喔～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13895.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>But don't worry! After all, I'll be there with
you this time!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13895.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「安心しろって～！！　なんたって
　今回は　このオレが　ついてるからな～！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13895.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 걱정할 것 없어~!!
　이번에는 나도 같이 가니까~!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13895.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>放心好了～
这回可是有我跟着呢！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13895.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>放心好了～！
這回可是有我跟著呢～！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13932.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>I guess we just have to put the Beast's Left
Horn and Beast's Right Horn on the floor here.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13932.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ここの床に　魔獣の左角と　魔獣の右角を
　突きたてれば　いいんだな～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13932.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이곳 바닥에 마수의 왼쪽 뿔과
　마수의 오른쪽 뿔을 꽂으랬지~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13932.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>只要将魔兽的左角和魔兽的右角
插到地面上就好了吧～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13932.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>只要將魔獸的左角和魔獸的右角
插到地面上就好了吧～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13933.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Let's just see what happens. Okay,
<cs_pchero>, are you ready to get started?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13933.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「何が起こるか　お楽しみだな。
　よし　<cs_pchero>　始めるか～？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13933.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 무슨 일이 일어날지 기대되는걸.
　좋아 <cs_pchero>, 시작할까~?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13933.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>真好奇会发生什么。
好，<cs_pchero>，我们开始吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13933.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>真好奇會發生什麼。
好，<cs_pchero>，我們開始吧～？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13934.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Oh, come on. Getting cold feet? I told you I
got your back. Let's just get it over with!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13934.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「おいおい。ビビッたのか？
　オレが　ついてるって言っただろ。
　いいから　さっさと　やれって～！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13934.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 뭐야 너, 쫄았어?
　내가 옆에 있잖아.
　됐으니까 빨리 꽂아~!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13934.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>喂喂，你害怕了吗？
不都说了有我跟着你吗。
好啦好啦，快点开始吧！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13934.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>喂喂，你害怕了嗎？
不都說了有我跟著你？
好啦好啦，快點開始吧～！<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13935.en:
<cs_pchero> placed both the Beast's Left Horn
and Beast's Right Horn on the floor...
13935.ja:
<cs_pchero>は　魔獣の左角と　魔獣の右角を
ふたつとも　床に突きたてた……。
13935.ko:
{cs_pchero}|hpp(은,는)
마수의 왼쪽 뿔과 마수의 오른쪽 뿔을
바닥에 꽂았다…….
13935.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>将魔兽的左角和魔兽的右角
插到地面上……
13935.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>將魔獸的左角和魔獸的右角
插到地面上……

13936.ja: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>「ズギャアアアァァァッ！！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13936.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>嘶呀啊啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13937.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Something came out! Looks like we're supposed
to take this big guy down.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13937.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「出やがった　出やがった～！
　コイツを倒せってことのようだぜ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13937.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 드디어 납셨군~!
　이 녀석을 해치워야 하나 본데?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13937.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>出来了，出来了！
好像是要打倒这家伙呢。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13937.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>出來了，出來了～！
好像是要打倒這傢伙呢。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13938.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Oh, right. If you don't beat him, it might
mean your training will fail.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13938.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「お～っと。アンタが倒さないと
　修行失敗ってことも　ありえるな～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13938.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 참, 네가 해치우지 않으면
　수련이 실패할 수도 있겠어~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13938.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>不对。如果不是由你打倒它的话，
没准就会算是修行失败呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13938.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>不對。得由你來打倒牠才行，
不然也可能會被判定修行失敗呢～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13939.en: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Let's see how you do. Good luck.<cs_pchero>~!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13939.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「お手並み拝見と　いかせてもらうぜ。
　がんばってくれよ　<cs_pchero>～！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13939.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 난 네 실력이나 구경하마.
　잘해 봐라, <cs_pchero>~!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13939.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>让我见识见识你的力量吧。
加油哦，<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13939.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>讓我見識見識你的力量吧。
加油喔，<cs_pchero>～！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13940.ja: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>「グリュウウ……！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13940.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>咕噜咕噜！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13940.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>咕嚕唔唔……！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13941.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Think you can do it this time, <cs_pchero>?
This guy looks like he's rarin' to go.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13941.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　今度はイケるよな？
　アイツは　ヤル気マンマンみたいだぜ～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13941.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 이번엔 이길 수 있지?
　저 녀석은 제대로 붙어볼 작정인 것 같아~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13941.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，这回没问题了吧？
看那家伙一副迫不及待的样子～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13941.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，這回沒問題了吧？
看那傢伙一副迫不及待的樣子～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13942.ja: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>「ズッギャァァァン！！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13942.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>嘶呀啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13943.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Not bad! After all your training so far, that
power isn't just for show.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13943.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「やるじゃねえか～。ここまでの修行を
　こなしてきたチカラは　ダテじゃね～な。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13943.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 제법인걸~ 그동안 가뿐히
　수련을 해낸 것도 다 이유가 있었구나?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13943.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>干得不错啊～果然至今为止的修行
都没有白干啊～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13943.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>幹得不錯嘛～不愧是完成至今修行的人，
力量真不是蓋的～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13944.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>With this, you've inherited the title of
Chosen One... right? Now you don't have to
worry about dying, right?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13944.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「これで　超天道士の名は
　アンタに継がれた……のか？
　死ぬ心配は　なくなったはずだよな～？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13944.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이제 초천도사의 이름은
　너한테 계승된 거…… 맞지?
　이제 죽을 걱정은 안 해도 되나~?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13944.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>这下超天道士的名号
就由你来继承……了吧？
不用担心会死掉了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13944.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>這下超天道士的名號
就由你繼承了……是嗎？
應該不用擔心會死掉了吧～？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13945.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, <cs_pchero>. You didn't pull any
punches, did you?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13945.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「おいおい　<cs_pchero>。
　アンタ　手を抜いたんじゃね～だろうな？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13945.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이봐, <cs_pchero>.
　너, 너무 마무리가 허술한 거 아니냐?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13945.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>喂喂，<cs_pchero>。
你该不会放水了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13945.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>喂喂，<cs_pchero>。
你該不會放水了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13946.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Ahh～, I ended up finishing it off. Are you
okay, <cs_pchero>? You're not going to die
on me, are you?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13946.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「あ～あ。結局　オレが　やっちまったか。
　<cs_pchero>　平気か～？
　死にそうだったり　しね～よな？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13946.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 아아~ 결국 내가 해치웠군.
　<cs_pchero>, 괜찮냐~?
　죽을 것 같다거나 그런 건 아니지?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13946.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>唉～最终还是我把它打败了。
<cs_pchero>，你没事吧？
不会快死了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13946.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>唉～最終還是我把牠打敗了。
<cs_pchero>，你沒事吧～？
不會快死了吧～？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13947.ja: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>「ギャリギャリギャリ……。<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13947.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>噶啦噶啦噶啦噶啦……<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13947.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m11001 _normal m00001>喀哩喀哩喀哩……<stop_lip_animation m11001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13948.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13948.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>豈有此理？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13949.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Is this thing immortal? If that's the case...
aren't we in a lot of trouble right now?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13949.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「コイツは　不死身の魔物なのか！
　だとしたら　コレは……マジでヤバいか？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13949.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이 마물은 불사신인가!?
　그렇다면 이거…… 진짜 위험한 거 아냐?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13949.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>这家伙难道是不死的怪物吗！
这可就……超不妙了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13949.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>這怪物難道是不死身！
這可就……超不妙了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13950.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>I once heard from the previous Chosen One that
the creature can only be defeated by putting
it into a state of intense shock.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13950.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「その魔物は　強烈なショック状態に
　おとさないかぎり　倒すことはできないと
　超天道士様に　聞いたことがありますよ。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13950.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 그 마물은 강한 충격 상태에
　빠뜨려야만 쓰러뜨릴 수 있다고
　초천도사님께 들은 적이 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13950.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>我听超天道士大人说过，
这个怪物不受到强烈的惊吓
是无法打倒它的。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13950.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>我聽超天道士大人說過，
必須要讓那個怪物
陷入強烈的驚嚇狀態才能打倒。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13951.en: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>So that's how it is...<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13951.ja: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「そういうことかよ……。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13951.ko: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 그런 거였나…….<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13952.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>If nothing is done, <cs_pchero> may indeed
perish.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13952.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「なんとかしないと　<cs_pchero>殿は
　本当に　死んでしまうかもしれませんね。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13952.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 무슨 수를 쓰지 않으면 <cs_pchero> 님이
　정말로 죽게 될 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13952.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>如果不想办法，<cs_pchero>大人
或许真的会死啊。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13952.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>如果不想辦法，<cs_pchero>閣下
或許真的會沒命啊。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13953.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Gaurad. You knew we couldn't beat it without
that technique, didn't you? Did the old man
plan all this?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13953.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「ガウラド～。お前　あの技がなきゃ
　コイツを倒せないのを　知ってたんだな。
　じ～さんの　仕込みってわけか？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13953.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 가우라드~ 너, 그 기술이 아니면
　이 녀석을 쓰러뜨릴 수 없다는 거 알고 있었지?
　이것도 다 영감님이 꾸민 짓인가?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13953.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>高拉德～你早就知道没有那招
是无法打倒这家伙的吧。
这是老爷子的诡计吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13953.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>高拉德～你知道沒有那招
是無法打倒這傢伙的吧。
所以這是老爺子的詭計嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13954.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Haah～ I don't want to use that technique...
I don't like playing right into that old man's
hands, but I have no choice.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13954.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「はあ～。あの技は使いたくないのによ……。
　なによりも　じ～さんの思うツボってのが　
　気に入らね～んだが　しかたね～なあ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13954.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 하아~ 그 기술은 쓰고 싶지 않은데…….
　무엇보다 영감님의 수작에 당했다는 게
　마음에 안 들지만 하는 수 없지.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13954.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>唉～我真不想用那招啊……
而且正中老爷子的下怀也让人感觉不爽，
不过，也没办法了～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13954.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>唉～我真不想用那招啊……
而且正中老爺子的下懷也讓人感覺不爽，
不過，也沒辦法了～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13955.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Then take this! The ultimate move of the
school of the Chosen One!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13955.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「それなら　食らえよ！
　超天道士直伝の必殺技！！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13955.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 그럼 받아라!
　초천도사님께 전수받은 필살기!!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13955.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>那就接招吧！
超天道士亲自传授的必杀技！！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13955.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>那就接招吧！
超天道士親自傳授的必殺技！！<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13957.en:
The copy of 'Choten Yugi: Book Four' in your
possession began to glow!
13957.ja:
<cs_pchero>の　持っている
『超天遊戯－死の書－』が　光り始めた！
13957.ko:
{cs_pchero}|hpp(이,가) 가지고 있는
『초천유희 죽음의 권』이 빛나기 시작했다!
13957.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>持有的
《超天游戏－死之书－》开始发光了！
13957.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>持有的
《超天遊戲－死之書－》開始發光了！

13958.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>...'Well done on completing your training.
With this, I have nothing left to teach you.'<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13958.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「……よくぞ　最後の修行を果たした。
　ワシが残せるものは　これで　すべてじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13958.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: ……마지막 수련까지 잘 해냈다.
　내가 남길 수 있는 건 이게 전부다.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13958.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>……恭喜你完成了最后的修行。
这就是我能留下的全部东西了。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13958.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>……恭喜你完成了最後的修行。
這就是我能留下的全部東西了。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13959.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>'You shall now inherit the title of the Chosen
One, with all the skills, heart, and teachings
that go with it.'<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13959.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「超天道士の名は　おぬしが受け継ぐがいい。
　その技と心　そして教えと共に。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13959.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 초천도사의 이름은 네가 이어받거라.
　그 기술과 마음, 그리고 가르침과 함께.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13959.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>超天道士的名号就由你来继承吧，
连同那个招式与心性，以及我的教诲。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13959.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>超天道士的名號就由你來繼承吧，
連同那個招式與心性，以及我的教誨。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13960.en:
'I will witness the birth of a new Chosen One, and the beginning of a new legend from the afterlife'... Old man... you knew you were
going to die, didn't you?
13960.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「新たな超天道士の誕生と　新たな伝説の始まりを
　ワシは　あの世から見守るとしよう……か。
　じ～さん　死ぬことが　わかってたんだな……。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13960.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 새로운 초천도사의 탄생과 전설의 시작을
　저세상에서 지켜보마……라.
　영감님, 자기가 죽을 걸 알고 있었구나…….<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13960.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我会在那个世界守护着新超天道士的诞生，
以及新传说的开始……
老爷子知道自己要死了啊……<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13960.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我會在那個世界守護著新超天道士的誕生，
以及新傳說的開始……
老爺子早就知道自己會死了吧……<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13961.en: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>Well done, Master Yarn!<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13961.ja: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「おみごとです　ヤーン様！<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13961.ko: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 잘하셨습니다, 얀 님!<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13961.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>干得漂亮，杨大人！<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13961.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>幹得漂亮，楊大人！<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13962.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>You have now inherited the title of Chosen One
in both name and deed!<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13962.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「これで　あなたは
　名実ともに　超天道士の名を
　その身に　受け継いだのです！！<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13962.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 당신은
　명실공히 초천도사의 이름을
　이어받은 겁니다!!<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13962.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>这下子，
你就继承了名号，
成为了名副其实的超天道士！！<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13962.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>這下子，
你就繼承了名號，
成為名符其實的超天道士！！<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13963.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Was this all just a set-up? Were you lying
about <cs_pchero> dying?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13963.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「お前　もしかして　オレをハメたのか？
　<cs_pchero>が死ぬって話も
　ウソだったんじゃ　ね～だろうな？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13963.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 너, 설마 날 속인 거냐?
　{cs_pchero}|hpp(이,가) 죽는다는 얘기도
　거짓말이었던 건 아니겠지?<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13963.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>你难不成给我下套了？
<cs_pchero>会死什么的，
也是骗我的吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13963.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>難不成，你算計我？
<cs_pchero>會死什麼的，
也是騙我的吧？<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13964.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>You misunderstand me, Master Yarn. For a
martial artist, death is always close at hand.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13964.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「人聞きが悪いですよ　ヤーン様。
　武闘家たる者　死の危険は
　いつ　いかなるときも　そばにあるのです。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13964.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 속이다니요, 얀 님.
　무투가란 자고로 언제나
　죽음의 위험이 따르는 법 아닙니까.<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13964.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>别这么说嘛，杨大人。
身为武术家，每时每刻
都会面对死亡的威胁。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13964.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>別這麼說嘛，楊大人。
身為武術家，時時刻刻
都會面對死亡的威脅。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13965.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>What's done is done... the title of Chosen One
is mine now, whether I like it or not.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13965.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「やっちまったものは　しかたないな……。
　超天道士の名。もらうだけ　もらっとくよ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13965.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 이미 벌어진 일은 어쩔 수 없지…….
　초천도사의 이름을 준다니 받는 수밖에.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13965.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>已经做过的事就没办法了……
那我就收下超天道士的名号啦。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13965.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>既然出手了也沒辦法……
我就收下超天道士的名號吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13966.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>My plan to have <cs_pchero> take over the
title of the Chosen One has failed. I'll be
taking back the Book of Death, now.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13966.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>に　超天道士の名を
　継いでもらおうって　オレの作戦は失敗だ。
　死の書は　このまま返してもらうぜ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13966.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>에게 초천도사의 이름을
　잇게 하려던 내 작전은 실패했군.
　죽음의 권도 돌려받아야겠어.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13966.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>看来我让<cs_pchero>
继承超天道士的名号的计划失败了。
死之书就还给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13966.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>看來我讓<cs_pchero>
繼承超天道士名號的計畫失敗了。
死之書就還給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13967.en:
<cs_pchero> returned the copy of 'Choten
Yugi: Book Four' to Yarn.
13967.ja:
<cs_pchero>は　ヤーンに
超天遊戯－死の書－を　返した。
13967.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>将超天游戏－死之书－
还给了杨。
13967.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>將超天遊戲－死之書－
還給了楊。

13968.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>I'm sorry for putting you in this situation
because of my selfishness.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13968.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「オレのわがままで　アンタを
　つきあわせちまって　悪かったな～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13968.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 내 고집 때문에
　널 끌어들여서 미안하다~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13968.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>都是因为我的任性，
才把你卷了进来，真是抱歉啊～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13968.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>都是因為我的任性，
才把你牽連了進來，真是抱歉啊～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13969.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>To make up for it, I'll teach you that
technique I used earlier. It's called Roaring Tirade.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13969.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「おわびと言っちゃ～アレだが
　さっきの技を　アンタにも　教えてやるよ。
　武闘家の必殺技　一喝っていうんだ。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13969.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 그 대신이라고 하긴 뭣하지만
　아까 쓴 기술을 너한테도 알려줄게.
　무투가의 필살기인 일갈이야.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13969.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>也不算是赔礼吧～
我就把刚才的招式教给你吧。
那是武术家的必杀技，大喝。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13969.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>雖然算不上賠禮，
我就把剛才的招式教給你吧。
那是武術家的必殺技，大喝。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13970.ja:
<cs_pchero>は　ヤーンの言葉に
耳をかたむけた……。

13971.en: <start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>It's not much, but I'll give you this.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13971.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「たいしたものじゃないが　コレを
　アンタに　贈らせてもらおう。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:

28425.ja: <cs_pchero>は　クエストをクリアした！

13972.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>Hey, you and me should fight sometime. I'm
sure I could have a good match with you.<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13972.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「なあ～　今度　オレと勝負してくれよ。
　アンタとだったら　きっと
　いい闘いが　できると思うぜ～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13972.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 있잖아, 다음에는 나랑 붙어 보자.
　너와 함께라면
　멋진 싸움을 할 수 있을 것 같거든~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13972.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>下次和我一决胜负吧～
如果对手是你的话，
一定能够进行一场精彩的战斗～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13972.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>下次和我一決勝負吧～
如果對手是你，
一定能有一場精彩的戰鬥～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13973.en:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>I'm going to start preparing. Come back to me
again after you've advanced more as a martial
artist. See you later, <cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13973.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「オレも　準備に取りかかるからさ～。
　武闘家になって　また　オレんとこへ来てくれ。
　それじゃ　またな　<cs_pchero>～。<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13973.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>: 나도 준비할 게 있으니까~
　무투가가 돼서 다시 날 찾아와.
　그럼 또 보자, <cs_pchero>~<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13973.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我也去准备准备～
成为武术家之后再来找我吧。
那就再见了，<cs_pchero>～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13973.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>我也去準備準備～
成為武術家之後再來找我吧。
那就再見了，<cs_pchero>～<stop_lip_animation n01109 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13974.en:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>At long last, the Chosen One has been reborn!
How I've waited for this moment...<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13974.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「ついに超天道士の復活が　なされた！
　どれだけ　この時を待ったのか……。<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13974.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>: 마침내 초천도사가 부활했다!
　이 순간을 얼마나 기다렸던가…….<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13974.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>超天道士终于复活了！我等了很久了……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13974.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>超天道士終於復活了！
我等這刻等很久了……<stop_lip_animation n01108 CLOSE_MOUTH>
